name: RTX 9™ Citrus
description: RTX 9™ Citrus is an all purpose automotive citrus cleaner-degreaser. The only cleaner you need – now with a fresh citrus scent. A first cousin to our flagship product RTX-9, RTX-9 Citrus has the same qualities of its predecessor. It has the power to replace eleven different product. You no longer need a separate floor cleaner, toilet bowl cleaner and child seat cleaner: RTX-9 Citrus does it all. From automotive interiors to exteriors, cleaning the floor of the auto bay to cleaning the countertop in the public restroom, this product delivers. Simplify your supplies; rely on RTX-9 Citrus to do it all. What makes RTX-9 Citrus different than the original RTX-9 formulation is the additive of citrus leaving a fresh scent long after cleaning. It was engineered specifically to meet the interior vehicle cleaning requirements of Hertz, while at the same time being 100% work safe and environmentally friendly
